mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ord.*,u.name uname,ad.accept accept, od.paystatus paystatus,od.sendstatus sendStatus, od.orderStatus orderStatus FROM shop_order ord, shop_orderdetail od, shop_address ad, shop_user u WHERE ord.userid = u.ID AND ord.addressid=ad.id AND od.orderid=ord.id AND ord.id=#{id}

SELECT ord.*,u.name uname,ad.accept accept,od.paystatus paystatus,od.sendstatus sendStatus, od.orderStatus orderStatus FROM shop_order ord, shop_orderdetail od, shop_address ad, shop_user u WHERE ord.userid = u.ID AND ord.addressid=ad.id AND od.orderid=ord.id AND ord.userid=#{userId}
mapper.update: update shop_order set paytime=#{payTime} where id=#{id}
